Articles.Content:
I\'m very happy to announce that today, the KSP forum has reached the 10,000 members mark. :thumbup:

Since we stopped counting downloads, keeping track of the game\'s outreach has become a much more complicated matter. One particular stat I\'ve kept my eye on was the member count on the forums here, so I\'m very happy to see our community reach this milestone.

Once more, many thanks to everyone who downloaded the game, and a special thanks to those who have been here with us from the start and are actively helping us continually improve KSP.

Happy Launchings!!

Cheers :cheers:

10,000 members already!! This is awesome!! xD

Thanks to all our fellows that have been with us since the beginning and to the new ones!! Welcome!!

Cheers!! xD
A most auspicious milestone!
My reaction, or possibly everyone\'s reaction.
Wow, that means I\'m part of the first 10,000 people to join this forum...

Holy poop! KSP is getting huge!

I remember when there were like 3 members on the forum. They grow up so fast :\'(

BTW, What member was I? I can imagine I\'m in the first 5.

UPDATE: Curses! Beaten by the other Orbitnauts! 26 is sill cool though. And, I\'m the second most active Orbitnaut too, behind Moach.
Whooo!! 10,000 members!

BTW, What member was I? I can imagine I\'m in the first 5.

UPDATE: Curses! Beaten by the other Orbitnauts! 26 is sill cool though. And, I\'m the second most active Orbitnaut too, behind Moach.

Sorry, but you\'re not even that high - you\'re at the top of page 3, at 60th most posts.

Proof: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=mlist;sort=posts;desc;start=60 (But look quickly because these things are very fluid. Spend enough time in Off Topic and you could roar up the lists!)
I think he\'s referring to join date. Good thing us mods can edit ours to whatever we like. I joined in 1955, dontcha know.

Sorry, but you\'re not even that high - you\'re at the top of page 3, at 60th most posts.

Proof: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=mlist;sort=posts;desc;start=60 (But look quickly because these things are very fluid. Spend enough time in Off Topic and you could roar up the lists!)

I wasn\'t referring to everyone, I was talking about the orbinauts. When KSP was released it was posted in a thread on O-F, where the mighty Orbinauts live. We were the first to DL, and join the forum.

I was saying that I\'m 2nd of the Orbinauts in posts, not everyone.

Oh, and :hailprobe:
Oh, and :hailprobe:

THE FALSE DEITY MUST DIETY

MAY HE FEEL THE WRATH OF :probe:

I wonder how many of those 10k members are spammer accounts.

For the record, I have the second highest post count, close behind HarvesteR.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Only because you whore your post count in the Welcome Aboard section.

Only because you whore your post count in the Welcome Aboard section.

I\'m providing a friendly atmosphere to new members. Part of our job as Mods.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
When I run for president and need a spin doctor, I\'ll definitely give you a call.
You worship combine harvesters?

No, just the one.

And only.
This thread is now about combine harvesters.
:hailprobe:

This thread is now about combine harvesters.

I\'ve got a brand new combine harvester...

this topic is now about Tractors

Btw HarvesteR i was thinking. on the Download page you should add a Counter of how many people have downloaded the game.

Obviously it will reset everytime you update. - it should look like the Altimeter

Btw HarvesteR i was thinking. on the Download page you should add a Counter of how many people have downloaded the game.

Obviously it will reset everytime you update. - it should look like the Altimeter

These have both been suggested! However, since a very high proportion of downloads are from mirrors Squad have no readily accessible count of the number of downloads, and the altimeter would be misleadingly low!

When it goes commercial and all downloads are available, THEN it would be worth having a counter.
well wouldn\'t HarvesteR just Inform the Mirror sites that to Host The Mirror Download they have to include a Counter. or doesn\'t it work that way?
